title: Register Your Interest for a Placement Year with Gymshark ü¶à 2024/25
content:
ABOUT US.
Conditioning Your Career Path: Gymshark Early Careers
We‚Äôre here to unite the conditioning community. We believe that putting the sweat in today, prepares us for tomorrow. So, we give people the tools they need to reach further, go faster, be stronger. We celebrate those who show up ‚Äì for themselves ‚Äì to be their physical or mental best, whatever that means for them. It‚Äôs what we want for our community, and our team. A team that‚Äôs growing rapidly around the world. A collective of talented individuals working together to invent Gymshark‚Äôs future. Our plans are ambitious, and we‚Äôre looking for people who want to join us for the ride ‚Äì our growth will be your growth.
Student Placement Programme
Our 13-month Student Placement Programme is designed to nurture future talent and help individuals become the best version of themselves. But we are not talking about the gym here! If you‚Äôve got a great vision for yourself, attitude, ambition, and drive to work hard, Gymshark could be the place for you!
When you work for us, you‚Äôre more than a placement student ‚Äì you‚Äôll‚ÄØjoin our‚ÄØGymshark‚ÄØfamily. We give people the tools they need to reach further, go faster and be the best version of themselves. We work hard, sure, but we have fun while we do it. A placement with us will give you a hands-on experience of what it‚Äôs like to work for a company that is growing at an exponential rate!
You‚Äôll get to work on real life projects and enjoy amazing development and networking opportunities. You‚Äôll also be guaranteed a healthy work-play balance!
What do we look for?
We‚Äôre not about box-ticking, a placement year is about developing you. To be successful for a placement at Gymshark, you will: 

Be passionate about learning and developing your skills
Be an effective‚ÄØcommunicator
Work successfully within a team environment and independently
Have good relationship building skills
Be able to manage and prioritise your time effectively
Thrive in a fast-paced environment

TO BE ELIGIBLE, YOU MUST:‚úÖ Be currently studying an undergraduate degree at university‚úÖ Be able to take 13 months out to do a year in industry before going back for your final year‚úÖ Have the right to work in the UK (unfortunately we cannot sponsorship for placement students)‚úÖ Be happy to work from our HQ campus in Solihull, West Midlands‚úÖ Be ready to start from July 2024
THE PERKS. üëÄ
We offer a diverse and inclusive culture, a supportive and sociable work environment, plus ample opportunities for professional growth, development, and networking.
Plus, just to mention some of our perks‚Ä¶
üå¥ 25 days holidays + your birthday and all the Bank Holidays which can be substituted and taken whenever you wantüôåA tailored and individualised placement approachüíª A truly Flexible Working Cultureüë• A collaborative, creative and inspiring working environmentü¶à 50% Gymshark Discountü•á Financial, Physical and Mental Wellbeing Supportüìö Great Training and Learning Resourcesüñ• Choice of hardware and access to the best softwareü§í Paid time off when you‚Äôre physically and mentally unwellüçé Refuel - Healthy fresh food at GSHQüèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Lifting Club (LC) Gym Membershipüëâ Free monthly massages

demographic_questions.description:
We highly encourage candidates to complete this survey, which will help us understand who is applying to join us. All the information we receive is anonymous and aggregated into an overall report so we can monitor our recruitment processes to make them more inclusive and take positive action to ensure Gymshark is diverse and representative.

For each of the questions, you have the option to select “Prefer not to say” if you don’t want to provide the information.

questions.label: How would you describe your gender identity?
Is your gender identity the same as the sex you were assigned at birth?

answer_options.label: Asian/Asian British - Prefer not to say
Black/African/Caribbean/Black British - Prefer not to say
Mixed/multiple ethnic groups - White & Black Caribbean
Mixed/multiple ethnic groups - White & Black African
Mixed/multiple ethnic groups - Prefer not to say
Other ethnic group - Prefer not to say

questions.label: Do you consider yourself to have a disability or impairment?
Which of the following best describes your sexual orientation?

questions.description: Including degree level, year of study and subject area.
questions.label: Please tell us the name of the course you are studying.
Are you permitted to carry out work related to a work placement that is assessed to be an integral part of the course that you are currently studying?
Are you available for the 13-month placement to start in July 2024?

questions.description: Legally, we have to verify your Right to Work in the UK before you can start work with us. We're asking for this information now so we know what type of right to work check we need to do later on in the process. Your answer to this question won't affect the outcome of your application, unless you need visa sponsorship and are applying for a role that we can't sponsor.
questions.label: Please confirm your UK Right to Work status.

values.label: I'm a UK or Irish National.
I'm an EU, EEA, or Swiss National with status under the EU Settlement Scheme.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me permanent right to work in the UK.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me temporary right to work in the UK.
I have visa sponsorship from another company, which gives me the right to work in the UK but, would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.
I don't have the right to work in the UK and would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.
